<script lang="ts">
  import { Menubar as MenubarPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
  import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";

  let {
    class: className,
    children,
    ...restProps
  }: { class?: string; children?: import("svelte").Snippet } & Record<string, any> = $props();
</script>

<MenubarPrimitive.Root
  class={cn(
    "flex h-10 items-center space-x-1 rounded-xl glass-heavy p-1 shadow-glass",
    className
  )}
  {...restProps}
>
  {#if children}
    {@render children()}
  {/if}
</MenubarPrimitive.Root>

<script lang="ts">
  import { Menubar as MenubarPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
  import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";

  let {
    class: className,
    ...restProps
  }: { class?: string } & Record<string, any> = $props();
</script>

<MenubarPrimitive.Trigger
  class={cn(
    "flex cursor-pointer select-none items-center rounded-lg px-3 py-1.5 text-sm font-medium outline-none transition-all duration-200",
    "hover:glass hover:shadow-glass",
    "data-[state=open]:glass data-[state=open]:shadow-glass",
    className
  )}
  {...restProps}
/>

<script lang="ts">
  import { Menubar as MenubarPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
  import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";

  let {
    class: className,
    sideOffset = 8,
    alignOffset = -4,
    ...restProps
  }: {
    class?: string;
    sideOffset?: number;
    alignOffset?: number;
  } & Record<string, any> = $props();
</script>

<MenubarPrimitive.Portal>
  <MenubarPrimitive.Content
    {sideOffset}
    {alignOffset}
    class={cn(
      "z-50 min-w-[12rem] overflow-hidden rounded-xl glass-heavy p-1 shadow-glass-lg",
      "data-[state=open]:animate-in data-[state=closed]:animate-out data-[state=closed]:fade-out-0 data-[state=open]:fade-in-0 data-[state=closed]:zoom-out-95 data-[state=open]:zoom-in-95",
      className
    )}
    {...restProps}
  />
</MenubarPrimitive.Portal>

<script lang="ts">
  import { Menubar as MenubarPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
  import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";

  let {
    class: className,
    ...restProps
  }: { class?: string } & Record<string, any> = $props();
</script>

<MenubarPrimitive.Item
  class={cn(
    "relative flex cursor-pointer select-none items-center rounded-lg px-2 py-1.5 text-sm outline-none transition-colors duration-150",
    "hover:glass hover:shadow-glass",
    "data-[disabled]:pointer-events-none data-[disabled]:opacity-50",
    className
  )}
  {...restProps}
/>

<script lang="ts">
  import { Menubar as MenubarPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
  import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";

  let {
    class: className,
    ...restProps
  }: { class?: string } & Record<string, any> = $props();
</script>

<MenubarPrimitive.Separator
  class={cn("-mx-1 my-1 h-px bg-white/10", className)}
  {...restProps}
/>
